\section{\mdline{19}1.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{19}线性回归}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={20}
\section{\mdline{20}2.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{20}分类算法}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={21}
\subsection{\mdline{21}2.1.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{21}Logistic Regression}\label{sec-logistic-regression}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={22}
\noindent\mdline{22}基本模型：%mdk
\label{}%mdk
\noindent\mdline{23}\mdmathtag{(1)}\mdline{23}
\noindent\[%mdk-data-line={24}
p(X)=\frac{e^{\beta_0+\beta_{1X}}}{1+e^{\beta_0+\beta_{1X}}}
\]%mdk
\noindent\mdline{26}Log-odds logit：
\label{}%mdk
\noindent\mdline{27}\mdmathtag{(2)}\mdline{27}
\noindent\[%mdk-data-line={28}
\log(\frac{p(X)}{1-p(X)}) = \beta_0+\beta_{1X}
\]%mdk
\noindent\mdline{30}最大似然参数估计：
\label{}%mdk
\noindent\mdline{31}\mdmathtag{(3)}\mdline{31}
\noindent\[%mdk-data-line={32}
  \zeta(\beta_0,\beta_1)= \prod_{i:y_i=1}p(x_i)\prod_{i:y_i=0}(1-p(x_i))
\]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={34}
\subsection{\mdline{34}2.2.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{34}Linear Discriminant Analysis}\label{sec-linear-discriminant-analysis}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={35}
\noindent\mdline{35}Logistic Regression适用于二元离散回归，当因变量大于2个时，使用LDA%mdk

%mdk-data-line={36}
\section{\mdline{36}3.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{36}重抽样}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={37}
\subsection{\mdline{37}3.1.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{37}Cross-Validation}\label{sec-cross-validation}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={38}
\subsubsection{\mdline{38}3.1.1.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{38}Leave-One-Out Cross-Validation}\label{sec-leave-one-out-cross-validation}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={39}
\noindent\mdline{39}\includegraphics[keepaspectratio=true,width=\dimmin{}{\dimwidth{0.80}}]{images/LOOCV}{}\mdline{39}%mdk
\label{}%mdk
\noindent\mdline{42}\mdmathtag{(4)}\mdline{42}
\noindent\[%mdk-data-line={43}
  CV=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}MSE_i
\]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={45}
\subsubsection{\mdline{45}3.1.2.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{45}k-Folder Cross-Validation}\label{sec-k-folder-cross-validation}%mdk%mdk
\label{}%mdk
\noindent\mdline{46}\mdmathtag{(5)}\mdline{46}
\noindent\[%mdk-data-line={47}
CV_{(K)}=\sum_{k=1}^{K}\frac{n_k}{n}MSE_k
\]%mdk
\noindent\mdline{49}LOOCV是k-Folder CV的一种特殊情况，即\mdline{49}$k=n$\mdline{49}。
